Reviews.Title: “Great option for a Berlin stay.”
Reviews.Author: Hubert_Cumberdale
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 4 nights check quick efficient immaculate comfortable breakfast expensive kitchenette fitness centre equipped stunning subterranean lap pool spa staff respectful low key location walking distance attractions appear dreary quiet safe times stay i’m berlin

Reviews.Title: “Clean, modern, comfortable with very professional & welcoming staff”
Reviews.Author: paul1980
Reviews.Content: stayed 7 nights berlin business hotel easily deserves stars clean equipped comfortable quaint bar restaurant health club found staff throughout hotel welcoming courteous professional willing help wherever greet smile location spent time potsdamer platz value hotel standard

Reviews.Title: “A nice hotel, worthy of the high tripadvisor ranking”
Reviews.Author: MsPhileasFogg
Reviews.Content: travelled mother berlin weekend arriving hotel told twin requested separate bedrooms suited chose hotel based top rated tripadvisor time booking regret choice feel conned breakfast couldnt remember booking prepaid rate included breakfast assured reception check charged extra wouldnt minded wed decision eat grabbed quick snack heading day cost breakfast overly expensive

Reviews.Title: “Great location & also got an upgrade!!”
Reviews.Author: emmaIre
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights found arrival upgrade suite lovely touch staff helpful directions else sauna benefit day snow free 24hrs ideal didnt eat breakfast expensive 15euro person plenty nice bakerys staying – initially slept bars – suppose depends you’re looking

Reviews.Title: “Hidden Gem!”
Reviews.Author: bexstee
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights weekend chose hotel based reviews read dissappointed arrival upgraded business suite free charge space hotel clean staff helpful speaking english sauna facilty downside breakfast pricey quality food choose location 5mins walk stadmitte bahn walk unter den linden brandenberg gate hotel located street quiet definately stay
